00055     public static function pluralize($word) {
00056         
00057         $plural = array(
00058                 '/(quiz)$/i' => '\1zes',
00059                 '/^(ox)$/i' => '\1en',
00060                 '/([m|l])ouse$/i' => '\1ice',
00061                 '/(matr|vert|ind)ix|ex$/i' => '\1ices',
00062                 '/(x|ch|ss|sh)$/i' => '\1es',
00063                 '/([^aeiouy]|qu)ies$/i' => '\1y',
00064                 '/([^aeiouy]|qu)y$/i' => '\1ies',
00065                 '/(hive)$/i' => '\1s',
00066                 '/(?:([^f])fe|([lr])f)$/i' => '\1\2ves',
00067                 '/sis$/i' => 'ses',
00068                 '/([ti])um$/i' => '\1a',
00069                 '/(buffal|tomat)o$/i' => '\1oes',
00070                 '/(bu)s$/i' => '\1ses',
00071                 '/(alias|status)/i'=> '\1es',
00072                 '/(octop|vir)us$/i'=> '\1i',
00073                 '/(ax|test)is$/i'=> '\1es',
00074                 '/s$/i'=> 's',
00075                 '/$/'=> 's'
00076             );
00077 
00078         $uncountable = array('equipment', 'information', 'rice', 'money', 'species', 'series', 'fish', 'sheep');
00079 
00080         $irregular = array(
00081                 'person' => 'people',
00082                 'man' => 'men',
00083                 'child' => 'children',
00084                 'sex' => 'sexes',
00085                 'move' => 'moves'
00086             );
00087 
00088         $lowercased_word = strtolower($word);
00089 
00090         foreach ($uncountable as $_uncountable){
00091             if(substr($lowercased_word,(-1*strlen($_uncountable))) == $_uncountable){
00092                 return $word;
00093             }
00094         }
00095 
00096         foreach ($irregular as $_plural=> $_singular){
00097             if (preg_match('/('.$_plural.')$/i', $word, $arr)) {
00098                 return preg_replace('/('.$_plural.')$/i', substr($arr[0],0,1).substr($_singular,1), $word);
00099             }
00100         }
00101 
00102         foreach ($plural as $rule => $replacement) {
00103             if (preg_match($rule, $word)) {
00104                 return preg_replace($rule, $replacement, $word);
00105             }
00106         }
00107         return false;
00108 
00109     }
00110 
00111     // }}}
00112     // {{{ singularize()
00113 
00121     public static function singularize($word) {
00122         
00123         $singular = array (
00124                 '/(quiz)zes$/i' => '\\1',
00125                 '/(matr)ices$/i' => '\\1ix',
00126                 '/(vert|ind)ices$/i' => '\\1ex',
00127                 '/^(ox)en/i' => '\\1',
00128                 '/(alias|status)es$/i' => '\\1',
00129                 '/([octop|vir])i$/i' => '\\1us',
00130                 '/(cris|ax|test)es$/i' => '\\1is',
00131                 '/(shoe)s$/i' => '\\1',
00132                 '/(o)es$/i' => '\\1',
00133                 '/(bus)es$/i' => '\\1',
00134                 '/([m|l])ice$/i' => '\\1ouse',
00135                 '/(x|ch|ss|sh)es$/i' => '\\1',
00136                 '/(m)ovies$/i' => '\\1ovie',
00137                 '/(s)eries$/i' => '\\1eries',
00138                 '/([^aeiouy]|qu)ies$/i' => '\\1y',
00139                 '/([lr])ves$/i' => '\\1f',
00140                 '/(tive)s$/i' => '\\1',
00141                 '/(hive)s$/i' => '\\1',
00142                 '/([^f])ves$/i' => '\\1fe',
00143                 '/(^analy)ses$/i' => '\\1sis',
00144                 '/((a)naly|(b)a|(d)iagno|(p)arenthe|(p)rogno|(s)ynop|(t)he)ses$/i' => '\\1\\2sis',
00145                 '/([ti])a$/i' => '\\1um',
00146                 '/(n)ews$/i' => '\\1ews',
00147                 '/s$/i' => ''
00148         );
00149 
00150         $uncountable = array('equipment', 'information', 'rice', 'money', 'species', 'series', 'fish', 'sheep');
00151 
00152         $irregular = array(
00153                 'person' => 'people',
00154                 'man' => 'men',
00155                 'child' => 'children',
00156                 'sex' => 'sexes',
00157                 'move' => 'moves'
00158             );
00159 
00160         $lowercased_word = strtolower($word);
00161         foreach ($uncountable as $_uncountable){
00162             if(substr($lowercased_word,(-1*strlen($_uncountable))) == $_uncountable){
00163                 return $word;
00164             }
00165         }
00166 
00167         foreach ($irregular as $_plural=> $_singular){
00168             if (preg_match('/('.$_singular.')$/i', $word, $arr)) {
00169                 return preg_replace('/('.$_singular.')$/i', substr($arr[0],0,1).substr($_plural,1), $word);
00170             }
00171         }
00172 
00173         foreach ($singular as $rule => $replacement) {
00174             if (preg_match($rule, $word)) {
00175                 return preg_replace($rule, $replacement, $word);
00176             }
00177         }
00178 
00179         return $word;
00180         
00181     }
00182

00184     // {{{ titleize()
00185 
00203     public static function titleize($word, $uppercase = '') {
00204         
00205         $uppercase = $uppercase == 'first' ? 'ucfirst' : 'ucwords';
00206         return $uppercase(Inflector::humanize(Inflector::underscore($word)));
00207         
00208     }
00209 
00210     // }}}
00211     // {{{ camelize()
00212 
00225     public static function camelize($word) {
00226         
00227         return str_replace(' ','',ucwords(preg_replace('/[^A-Z^a-z^0-9]+/',' ',$word)));
00228         
00229     }
00230 
00231     // }}}
00232     // {{{ underscore()
00233 
00246     public static function underscore($word) {
00247         
00248         return  strtolower(preg_replace('/[^A-Z^a-z^0-9]+/','_',
00249         preg_replace('/([a-z\d])([A-Z])/','\1_\2',
00250         preg_replace('/([A-Z]+)([A-Z][a-z])/','\1_\2',$word))));
00251         
00252     }
00253 
00254     // }}}
00255     // {{{ humanize()
00256 
00273     public static function humanize($word, $uppercase = '') {
00274         
00275         $uppercase = $uppercase == 'all' ? 'ucwords' : 'ucfirst';
00276         return $uppercase(str_replace('_',' ',preg_replace('/_id$/', '',$word)));
00277         
00278     }
00279 
00280     // }}}
00281     // {{{ variablize()
00282 
00295     public static function variablize($word) {
00296         
00297         $word = Inflector::camelize($word);
00298         return strtolower($word[0]).substr($word,1);
00299         
00300     }
00301 
00302     // }}}
00303     // {{{ tableize()
00304 
00316     public static function tableize($class_name) {
00317         
00318         return Inflector::pluralize(Inflector::underscore($class_name));
00319         
00320     }
00321 
00322     // }}}
00323     // {{{ classify()
00324 
00336     public static function classify($table_name) {
00337         
00338         return Inflector::camelize(Inflector::singularize($table_name));
00339         
00340     }

00343     // {{{ ordinalize()
00344 
00354     static function ordinalize($number) {
00355         
00356         if (in_array(($number % 100),range(11,13))){
00357             return $number.'th';
00358         }else{
00359             switch (($number % 10)) {
00360                 case 1:
00361                 return $number.'st';
00362                 break;
00363                 case 2:
00364                 return $number.'nd';
00365                 break;
00366                 case 3:
00367                 return $number.'rd';
00368                 default:
00369                 return $number.'th';
00370                 break;
00371             }
00372         }
00373         
00374     }
